Title: IBM Operational Decision Manager V8.8.1.3: Interim Fix 84 - United States

Text:
 DOWNLOAD

ABSTRACT
This interim fix provides a solution for APARs RS03056 and RS03096.

DOWNLOAD DESCRIPTION
The following list shows the components in Operational Decision Manager that are directly affected by this interim fix:

 * Decision Center
 * Rule Execution Server


Refer to the following list for APAR fixes:

 * RS03056 [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1RS03056]: SHOW AN ERROR (A WARNING) IF A LIBRARY CONTAINS THE SAME XOM MULTIPLE TIMES
 * RS03096 [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1RS03096]: XU CONNECTION LOST WHEN DATASOURCE NOT AVAILABLE

SEE ALSO
Operational Decision Manager Interim Fixes [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21640630]

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
Follow the instructions in the readme.
